content.prompt: Which of the following claims is supported by the arguments made by both Levine and Langguth?

choices.label: Local political tactics served to deny African Americans their rights.
White southerners accepted racial and political equality.
Republicans permanently changed the balance of political power in the South.
African Americans gained property rights while becoming self-sufficient.

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Compare the arguments or main ideas of two sources.
